data.text: @MrMcEnaney @sqanews It actually, in some ways, has made it even harder. Which is quite an achievement.
@Allan_TSSA850 I’m sure someone said they’d been taught by Morgan? Doesn’t explain the other visits right enough. Don’t think any of us appreciated it at the time!

@MattKerrLabour How Jan Mathieson was able to book such authors/poets was always magic.
She's through in Williamwood these days still teaching, ⛪.
@Allan_TSSA850 @lauren_gilmour4 I remember Edwin Morgan’s visit. A lovely man.

@MrMcEnaney @sqanews This may be useful if you were just covering the Scottish text now. If you knew the exact section of a you could teach everything in what 10 lessons? Much less useful if you'd done the Scottish text term one and were now covering an extra essay text or fine tuning RUAE.
